title: Designing Cognitive-Social Participation Types for Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning environment experience and foundational collaboration tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Blended environment design for solving practical problems in science fields targeting advanced professional learners (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply six participation types (latent, superficial, task, reactive, expansive, generative) in online discussion platforms
Learners can analyze cognitive-social participation profiles (benchwarmer, hustler, striker, champion) to improve learning strategies
Learners can maintain social interaction at over 80% frequency while solving complex science problems using collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
